review: Very easy set up.  Great if you subscribe to Prime; limited if you don't.
author: Douglas N Reinholtz

review: I have and regularly use the Fire TV Stick, Roku 3, and Chromecast.  Each have their strengths.  The Fire TV Stick provides the best interface into your Amazon content.  However, by optimizing the experience for Amazon content, I find it has made access to non-Amazon content to be a non-optimal experience.  It's easier and faster to use the Roku for content like Netflix, Youtube, Pandora, etc...  So if you plan to spend most of your time accessing Amazon content, go for the Fire TV Stick.
